    • com.google.android.filament中Engine的使用

      返回Engine的com.google.android.filament中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Engine Engine.Builder.build()
      Creates an instance of Engine
      static Engine Engine.create()
      Creates an instance of Engine using the default Engine.Backend This method is one of the few thread-safe methods.
      static Engine Engine.create(Engine.Backend backend)
      Creates an instance of Engine using the specified Engine.Backend This method is one of the few thread-safe methods.
      static Engine Engine.create(java.lang.Object sharedContext)
      Creates an instance of Engine using the Engine.Backend.OPENGL and a shared OpenGL context.
      Engine Renderer.getEngine()
      Gets the Engine that created this Renderer.
      参数类型为Engine的com.google.android.filament中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      VertexBuffer VertexBuffer.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates the VertexBuffer object and returns a pointer to it.
      Texture Texture.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates a new Texture instance.
      Stream Stream.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates a new Stream object instance.
      Skybox Skybox.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates a Skybox object
      SkinningBuffer SkinningBuffer.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates and returns the SkinningBuffer object.
      RenderTarget RenderTarget.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates the RenderTarget object and returns a pointer to it.
      MorphTargetBuffer MorphTargetBuffer.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates and returns the MorphTargetBuffer object.
      Material Material.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates and returns the Material object.
      IndirectLight IndirectLight.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates the IndirectLight object and returns a pointer to it.
      IndexBuffer IndexBuffer.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates and returns the IndexBuffer object.
      ColorGrading ColorGrading.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates the IndirectLight object and returns a pointer to it.
      BufferObject BufferObject.Builder.build(Engine engine)
      Creates and returns the BufferObject object.
      void RenderableManager.Builder.build(Engine engine, int entity)
      Adds the Renderable component to an entity.
      void LightManager.Builder.build(Engine engine, int entity)
      Adds the Light component to an entity.
      void View.clearFrameHistory(Engine engine)
      When certain temporal features are used (e.g.: TAA or Screen-space reflections), the view keeps a history of previous frame renders associated with the Renderer the view was last used with.
      void Texture.generateMipmaps(Engine engine)
      Generates all the mipmap levels automatically.
      void Texture.generatePrefilterMipmap(Engine engine, Texture.PixelBufferDescriptor buffer, int[] faceOffsetsInBytes, Texture.PrefilterOptions options)
      Creates a reflection map from an environment map.
      static boolean SwapChain.isProtectedContentSupported(Engine engine)
      Return whether createSwapChain supports the CONFIG_PROTECTED_CONTENT flag.
      static boolean SwapChain.isSRGBSwapChainSupported(Engine engine)
      Return whether createSwapChain supports the CONFIG_SRGB_COLORSPACE flag.
      static boolean Texture.isTextureFormatSupported(Engine engine, Texture.InternalFormat format)
      Checks whether a given format is supported for texturing in this Engine.
      static boolean Texture.isTextureSwizzleSupported(Engine engine)
      Checks whether texture swizzling is supported in this Engine.
      void SkinningBuffer.setBonesAsMatrices(Engine engine, java.nio.Buffer matrices, int boneCount, int offset)
      Updates the bone transforms in the range [offset, offset + boneCount).
      void SkinningBuffer.setBonesAsQuaternions(Engine engine, java.nio.Buffer quaternions, int boneCount, int offset)
      Updates the bone transforms in the range [offset, offset + boneCount).
      void IndexBuffer.setBuffer(Engine engine, java.nio.Buffer buffer)
      Asynchronously copy-initializes this IndexBuffer from the data provided.
      void BufferObject.setBuffer(Engine engine, java.nio.Buffer buffer)
      Asynchronously copy-initializes this BufferObject from the data provided.

      Asynchronously copy-initializes a region of this IndexBuffer from the data provided.

      Asynchronously copy-initializes a region of this BufferObject from the data provided.
      void VertexBuffer.setBufferAt(Engine engine, int bufferIndex, java.nio.Buffer buffer)
      Asynchronously copy-initializes the specified buffer from the given buffer data.
      void VertexBuffer.setBufferAt(Engine engine, int bufferIndex, java.nio.Buffer buffer, int destOffsetInBytes, int count)
      Asynchronously copy-initializes a region of the specified buffer from the given buffer data.

      void VertexBuffer.setBufferObjectAt(Engine engine, int bufferIndex, BufferObject bufferObject)
      Swaps in the given buffer object.
      void Texture.setExternalImage(Engine engine, long eglImage)
      Specifies the external image to associate with this Texture.

      Specifies the external stream to associate with this Texture.
      void Texture.setImage(Engine engine, int level, int xoffset, int yoffset, int zoffset, int width, int height, int depth, Texture.PixelBufferDescriptor buffer)
      setImage is used to modify a sub-region of a 3D texture, 2D texture array or cubemap from a CPU-buffer.
      void Texture.setImage(Engine engine, int level, int xoffset, int yoffset, int width, int height, Texture.PixelBufferDescriptor buffer)
      setImage is used to modify a sub-region of the texture from a CPU-buffer.
      void Texture.setImage(Engine engine, int level, Texture.PixelBufferDescriptor buffer)
      setImage is used to modify the whole content of the texture from a CPU-buffer.
      void Texture.setImage(Engine engine, int level, Texture.PixelBufferDescriptor buffer, int[] faceOffsetsInBytes)
      已过时。 
      use Texture.setImage(Engine, int, int, int, int, int, int, int, PixelBufferDescriptor)
      void MorphTargetBuffer.setPositionsAt(Engine engine, int targetIndex, float[] positions, int count)
      Updates float4 positions for the given morph target.
      void MorphTargetBuffer.setTangentsAt(Engine engine, int targetIndex, short[] tangents, int count)
      Updates tangents for the given morph target.
